title: Bond Dip-Buyers Rewarded on News of Greenland ‘Framework’ Deal
description: Investors who bought into this week’s Treasuries selloff are reaping the reward after President Donald Trump backed off his threat to slap new tariffs on European nations as part of his push to acquire Greenland.
content: Investors who bought into this week’s Treasuries selloff are reaping the reward after President Donald Trump backed off his threat to slap new tariffs on European nations as part of his push to acquire Greenland.
